title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

A dead man's family slapped a former Quincy dominatrix with a $1 million lawsuit in federal court yesterday charging she failed to use “safe, sane sadomasochistic techniques” when she dismembered “Big Mike” Lord and hid his body parts. [from the Boston Herald, January 17, 2003. Submitted by David Derow, Haverhill, MA, who asks just what “safe, sane sadomasochistic techniques” should be employed for a dismemberment.]
